level.heading: Review.
level.text: All decisions and findings of the Commissioner made under the provisions of this chapter shall be subject to review as provided by subchapters I and II of Chapter 2 of Title 5.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-86
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-86, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-5301.
